item.title: [Android] The Pawn
item.description: [Android] The Pawn The Pawn is an original puzzle game, inspired by chess. You don’t need to know the rules of Chess to play, as it is quite different. Tap to move, one square at a time. Move onto another friend piece to change into it. Change into the king to win. Move onto an enemy piece to knock it out. Each piece has a different move set, indicated by arrows.
